text: Pegler may refer to: ==People== * Alan Pegler, a British railway preservationist * Alice Pegler, a South African teacher and botanical collector * Don Pegler, an Australian politician * Luke Pegler, an Australian actor * Sid Pegler, a South African cricketer * Westbrook Pegler, an American journalist and writer * Pegler Yorkshire, a UK-based valve manufacturer ==Places== * Hetty Pegler's Tump, a Neolithic burial mound in Gloucestershire, England
title: Pegler
